text.author: Wrh2Bot, Ground Zero, T.seppelt and others (see URL)
text.title: Guadeloupe
text.summary: This guide lists attractions on each of the islands of Guadeloupe, a French overseas department in the Caribbean, focusing on places on the island of Grand Terre, including the economic capital Pointe-à-Pitre, the nightlife in Gosier, views from St François, the touristy city and beach of St Anne, cemetary of Morne à l'eau and other destinations around the islands.
